channel.title: My apology to all players on the official server
channel.description:
Yes, I understand that every single thing that I did yesterday, on the official server (lying about reyx, faking images, threatening to hack and grief) were completely the wrong things to do. I was just having a bad day, and unfortunately I'm not perfect unlike most of the members on here, and my psychological mindset forces to me humourise everything that happens when I'm in a bad mood, and I was in a bad mood yesterday so I made everything into a stupid joke. Now I would completely understand if you banned me for what I did, I just ask you to thoroughly think about banning me, as I promise to take everything I do on the server seriously and not joke about anything, if you so wish.
Extra apologies to Cole1497 and reyx7, I had no right to do what I did and I hope you forgive me.
inb4havecounselling: I've got counselling.

item.title: My apology to all players on the official server
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

ranger squad:

There’s a difference between a temper tantrum and a psychological problem, please get some respect.

Nobody gives a damn if you have a psychological problem. You can try to hide behind it all you want, but unless you find a way to control it, you can just fuck off because no one here is going to put up with it.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:26, topic:379819”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=475661.msg3478663#msg3478663 date=1295911662]
No, if you get banned I will hand Haven over to my friend who I know in real life. But at the moment I am still playing (seriously) and hopefully David will read this.
[/quote]David read.
David will ban.[/quote]
Good call.

Read full topic
